\name{Board.Chaser}
\alias{Board.Chaser}
\title{Board.Chaser}
\usage{
Board.Chaser <- (PLAYER_NAME, REB)
}
\arguments{
\item{PLAYER_NAME}{The name of the player}
\item{REB}{Rebounds per game of the player}
}
\description{
Rate a players ability to grab rebounds
}
\examples{
Board.Chaser("Lebron James", 2)
}
